title: Djokovic And Federer Step Up In Wimbledon Semis
teaser: Action on the grass courts of Wimbledon is nearing its climax, as former champions and future stars competed in semifinal play. Novak Djokovic and Roger Federer advanced to the finals.
contentencoded:
Action on the grass courts of Wimbledon is nearing its climax, as former champions and future stars competed in semifinal play. Novak Djokovic and Roger Federer advanced to the finals. Jon Wertheim of Sports Illustrated discusses the results.
